
name: battery_db
name       query
----       -----
cq_temp_m5 CREATE CONTINUOUS QUERY cq_temp_m5 ON battery_db BEGIN SELECT sum(interval) AS interval, first(local_dt) AS local_dt, mean(temp_closet) AS avg_temp_closet, max(temp_closet) AS max_temp_closet, min(temp_closet) AS min_temp_closet, mean(temp_shed) AS avg_temp_shed, mean(temp_outdoor) AS avg_temp_outdoor, first(heater) AS heater, sum(heater * interval) AS heater_on, first(heater_watts) AS heater_watts, last(heater_kWhr) - first(heater_kWhr) AS heater_kWhr INTO battery_db.m5.temp FROM battery_db.s5.temp GROUP BY time(5m), * END
> select * from battery_db.m5.temp
> select * from temp
name: temp
time                heater heater_kWhr heater_watts interval  local_dt            temp_closet temp_outdoor temp_shed yr_mo
